ygData.messageBody:
Greeting to all I am new Just joined this group & I am having a HUGE problem:(( Can anyone help or make a suggestion?
 
I am a Grandmaster in both Brewing & Baking now. There seems to be some type of Tradeskill bug going around & I wanted to know if you know anything about it? I am not able to go past 252 in skill? Not with my Grandmaster Corker/Spoon or Geerlock? At 252 it just stops & it will not pass 252 I enclosed snapshots & have also forwarded this to Everquest as well. I am also not able to get my Grandmaster Carry all bag from Gnome in Bazaar either. This is a real bummer & EQ has known about this & isn't doing much atm? Even with Enhanced Patch I am failing insainly still:(( & Am not able to make anything in the Higher trivials passing 252 either.
 
Maridizi
 
Quellious Server
